base_description: Gray, cylindrical, modern faucet with dual handles.
part_description: Consists of a tall cylindrical body, two horizontal handles, and a spout. The handles are symmetrically positioned on either side of the body, with the spout extending forward. Each part is sleek and minimalistic in design.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control the flow of water through the internal valves, allowing for precise adjustment. When turned, the handles open or close the valves, regulating water flow through the spout. The internal design ensures smooth operation and efficient water delivery.
external_interaction_description: The faucet is designed to be mounted on a sink, interacting with plumbing systems to deliver water. Users interact with the handles to control water temperature and flow. Its modern design complements contemporary bathroom or kitchen aesthetics, enhancing both functionality and style.
